channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache MXNet
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache MXNet

item.title: CVE-2022-24294|2024-08-03T04:07:02.340Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20mxnet
item.description: A regular expression used in Apache MXNet (incubating) is vulnerable to a potential denial-of-service by excessive resource consumption. The bug could be exploited when loading a model in Apache MXNet that has a specially crafted operator name that would cause the regular expression evaluation to use excessive resources to attempt a match. This issue affects Apache MXNet versions prior to 1.9.1.
